summary: The Protect Our Communities from DUIs Act amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to make aliens inadmissible and deportable if they have been convicted of or committed an offense for driving while intoxicated or impaired. This includes driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs, regardless of whether the offense is classified as a misdemeanor or felony. The bill aims to enhance public safety by restricting the presence of individuals with DUI related offenses.
